comment.author: 26881258@N07
comment._content:
Although the pictures are of exceptional quality and very rare Friedrichshafen is wrongly spelled for the whole lot with the result that I could not find them and had to use tricks. It is surely possibly to correct this with a program in the batch.

The picture shows the first Friedrichshafen FF 19 Marinenummer '25' delivered just before the start of the war on May 17, 1914.

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment.authorname: San Diego Air & Space Museum Archives
